data.text: @becca_kirby_nz Kia ora Rebecca, your son won't need another test and he is free to leave isolation.
@covid19nz @minhealthnz can you help with this question?
@Infadinglight Please contact the Ministry of Health about this as we use their data for our updates.
@covid19nz @jeffreygiraffeearlychildhood learning centre https://t.co/hJ2cbJRrSh Idris Rd Christchurch don't wear masks and have kids at their house at 151 moncks spur rd christchurch in covid times

@covid19nz We got a test because my son was a close contact. We were only told 7 days after he was in contact with the case. We are now 13 days post his contact with the case. We don’t have any symptoms.

@becca_kirby_nz Kia ora Rebecca, it depends why you got a test in the first place. If you got a test because you were a Close Contact and don't have symptoms - you don't need another test. If you are symptomatic, please get another test.
@becca_kirby_nz @covid19nz I'd say repeat the RAT to confirm you are indeed negative ,  and continue ISO to be safe.
@turk_mason @covid19nz Will be higher , especially amongst the protestors .
@covid19nz Betting this outbreak was the direct result of the Auckland Parliament running protests .... same as happened in Victoria.
@covid19nz The country enter on level 4 with 60 cases…. That's the tweet
